channel.title: Customs

item.title: Customs
item.dc:creator: @50percentelf 50percentelf
item.description:
@50percentelf wrote:

Actually there are several wonderfully written tutorials on this very site :). I would recommend looking for 1 custom to add like korasi and then just play with it.

Read full topic

item.title: Customs
item.dc:creator: @Rawr_is_me Rawr is me
item.description:
@Rawr_is_me wrote:

[quote=“50percentelf, post:2, topic:422473”]a lot of it is client sided, there are several guides on adding customs. really all it is is putting int’s for a new item and dumping the model into like your raw. if you want to create your own customs thats a whole different ball park.[/quote]doesn’t seem to hard…should i try youtube maybe?

Read full topic

item.title: Customs
item.dc:creator: @50percentelf 50percentelf
item.description:
@50percentelf wrote:

a lot of it is client sided, there are several guides on adding customs. really all it is is putting int’s for a new item and dumping the model into like your raw. if you want to create your own customs thats a whole different ball park.

[Edit] What youve mentioned can be done by recoloring though.

Read full topic
